tool_description: Get the latest news about cannabis and psychedelics from all over the world
name: Cannabis News
title: Cannabis News

api_list.name: Get cannabis news from specific sources
api_list.description: Get cannabis news from a specific source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cannabis-news.p.rapidapi.com/cannabis/hightimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cannabis-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://cannabis-news.p.rapidapi.com/cannabis/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cannabis-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
